item.title: Varnish allow/reject connections with IPs list (ACL)
item.description: In a web server you can use directives to deny the unwanted eye to look at your content. This is an example of how Apache would handle a virtual host that only accepts connections from a series of IPs, but in Varnish that won't work. Order Deny,Allow Deny from all # Barcelona IPs Allow from 89.140.xxx.xxx/27 # Japan IP Allow from 222.229.xxx.xxx/32 The reason that this won't work in Varnish is because the IP Apache is receiving is 127.
